name: IBochs Virtual Hard Disk
summary: Learn about .HD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: IBochs uses LBOCHS.HD to save and load users' data. For example, users can write an operating system to LBOCHS.HD and then load that operating system from IBochs's boot menu. Users can also load operating systems from virtual floppy disks (.FD files) and CD-ROMs.

description: An HD file is a virtual hard disk used by the IBochs PC Emulator for Android. IBochs users can write data to this file just as they would a real hard disk. IBochs comes with one included HD file, named LBOCHS.HD.

instructions: LBOCHS.HD is not meant to be opened. If your copy of LBOCHS.HD contains an operating system, you can use the file to load the operating system in IBochs PC Emulator (Android). To do so:
Make sure your LBOCHS.HD file is stored in ~/​Android/​data/​lb.myapp.lbochs/​files.
Open IBochs and press F12 to access the boot menu.
The operating system your HD file contains will then load in IBochs.
